Package modele.joueurs

Class Joueur

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
modele.joueurs.Joueur
Direct Known Subclasses:
JoueurReel, JoueurVirtuel
public abstract class Joueur
extends java.util.Observable
This abstract class will be used for representing a player of the game.

      Consists in putting a card on the board
      Parameters:
      plateau - a reference of the board.
      carte - the card the player wants to put.
      position - the position where the player puts the card.
      Returns:
      true if the placement went through without problem.
